messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when Paula rolls a 04 with her investigator?
Her investigator faints.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the only way outside from the room, according to the professor?
Past the Thing.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the barred windows made of?
iron gratings
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What seems to be the only way outside?
past the Thing
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who originated the Cthulhu Mythos?
H.P. Lovecraft
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the setting for most Lovecraft's tales in the Call of Cthulhu scenarios?
The 1920s in the United States
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the time period referred to as in the Call of Cthulhu scenarios?
The Classic Era in the United States
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why do the 1920s represent modern-day to Lovecraft?
Because they were modern to Lovecraft
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When was the original Call of Cthulhu published?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many editions of Call of Cthulhu have been published?
Seven
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who has been supporting the Call of Cthulhu since its publication?
Chaosium
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can the Old Ones' machinations spill into?
Any conceivable setting or historical period
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When was the New Edition of Call of Cthulhu originally published?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the current edition of Call of Cthulhu and the changes it sees?
The seventh edition, which has been fully revised and sees some significant changes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can you find advice for using previously published material in the 7th edition?
In the section 'Converting to 7th Edition' on page 390
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is recommended for anyone hoping to run a game of Call of Cthulhu?
Becoming familiar with the works of H.P. Lovecraft
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Which works are considered the heart of the Cthulhu Mythos?
The Lurking Fear, The Horror at Red Hook, The Colour Out of Space, The Dunwich Horror, The Shadow Over Innsmouth, and The Dreams
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be learned from reading Lovecraft's stories?
A lot about the Cthulhu Mythos and some key horror themes
